id.description: Unique identifier for the data migration.

source_id.description: ID of the Migration Source from which to migrate data.

target_bucket_name.description: Bucket name to migrate the data into. Will default to the same name as the `source_bucket_name`.

target_region.description: Telnyx Cloud Storage region to migrate the data to.

refresh.description: If true, will continue to poll the source bucket to ensure new data is continually migrated over.

last_copy.description: Time when data migration was last copied from the source.

bytes_to_migrate.description: Total amount of data found in source bucket to migrate.

bytes_migrated.description: Total amount of data that has been succesfully migrated.

eta.description: Estimated time the migration will complete.

created_at.description: Time when data migration was created
